statements: SELECT * FROM PowerUsageData;
SELECT meter_id, power_usage, timestamp FROM PowerUsageData;
SELECT * FROM PowerUsageData WHERE power_usage > 100;
SELECT timestamp, power_usage FROM PowerUsageData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT power_usage, timestamp FROM PowerUsageData WHERE meter_id='abc-123' ORDER BY power_usage ASC;
SELECT meter_id, timestamp, power_usage FROM PowerUsageData;
SELECT meter_id, power_usage, timestamp FROM PowerUsageData WHERE power_usage > 100;
SELECT * FROM PowerUsageData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-02 00:00:00';
SELECT avg(power_usage) AS average_power_usage FROM PowerUsageData GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT meter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM PowerUsageData GROUP BY meter_id HAVING total_records > 10;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location, power_usage FROM smart_meters ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT timestamp, location FROM smart_meters WHERE power_usage > 100;
SELECT meter_id, power_usage FROM smart_meters WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT consumption_id, consumption_amount, consumption_date FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters WHERE power_usage > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_meters FROM smart_meters GROUP BY location;
SELECT meter_id, power_usage, timestamp FROM smart_meters WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN smart_meters sm ON ec.meter_id = sm.meter_id WHERE consumption_amount >= 50;
SELECT location, AVG(power_usage) AS avg_power_usage FROM smart_meters GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(power_usage) > 75;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, location_id, usage_date, power_usage_kwh FROM smart_meters;
SELECT street_address, city, state, country FROM locations;
SELECT meter_id, usage_date, power_usage_kwh FROM energy_consumption WHERE power_usage_kwh > 100;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT location_id, power_usage_kwh FROM energy_consumption WHERE power_usage_kwh > 100;
SELECT meter_id, usage_date, power_usage_kwh FROM smart_meters WHERE usage_date = '2022-10-01';
SELECT city, state, SUM(power_usage_kwh) AS total_usage FROM locations l JOIN smart_meters s ON l.location_id = s.location_id GROUP BY city, state;
SELECT DISTINCT city, state, country FROM locations ORDER BY country DESC, city ASC;
SELECT * FROM meters;
SELECT location, manufacturer, installation_date FROM meters WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT meter_id, location FROM meters ORDER BY meter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM power_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT consumer_name, location FROM energy_consumers WHERE is_residential = TRUE;
SELECT meter_id, location, installation_date FROM meters;
SELECT * FROM meters ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT consumer_name, location, is_residential FROM energy_consumers WHERE is_residential = true;
SELECT consumption_id, reading_time, consumption FROM power_consumption WHERE consumption > 100;
SELECT meter_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM power_consumption GROUP BY meter_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, meter_type FROM smart_meters ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM buildings WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM energy_providers;
SELECT consumer_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM smart_meters;
SELECT meter_id, installation_date FROM smart_meters WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM buildings ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM energy_providers WHERE provider_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT consumer_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumers WHERE energy_usage > 500 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
